column6: APOCOLYPSE WAS RIGHT. In the wake of last issue's devastating climax, X-Factor has discovered that the ancient mutant's portents of doom were more than idle threats. With the Celestials' hour of judgment upon them, it's up to Xavier's original mutants to make the greatest sacrifice of all. It's a FOREVER farewell from X-Legend Louise Simonson! Rated A ...$3.99
column8: | penciller:Aluir Amancio | penciller:Eric Nguyen | penciller:Dan Panosian | writer:Louise Simonson
